templatePuzzle.description:
# Template Question
### Template Description Header
This is a template question used to base question formats off of.
Links are embedded in cases where they are needed for external resources such as [Google](https://google.com)
or other web related actions such as web requests.
This part should only serve as a description to the puzzles and not as a way to submit flags.
